E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 2/4/1986
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
RF David Seely, 2B Anderson Valvo
in return for
CF Axel Lizarraga.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Bay City GM



Date: Monday, 5/5/1986
Subject: Well...
I am rather upset that I do not play regularly.
I wish to be traded if that doesn't change!

Regards,
Axel Lizarraga



Date: Sunday, 5/25/1986
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Joseph Robey



Date: Wednesday, 5/28/1986
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Louis Miller



Date: Sunday, 6/1/1986
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Allen Nunnery



Date: Monday, 6/23/1986
Subject: Eugene Starke learns new position

learning his new position, Shortstop.

Regards,
Your scouting director
